name: BetterAutoModerator
description: BAM is a refreshed and super-charged version of Reddit's existing auto-moderator functionality.

REDDIT_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID for your Reddit applicaiton (see https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps)

REDDIT_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret for your Reddit applicaiton (see https://www.reddit.com/prefs/apps)

REDDIT_USERNAME.description: The username for your Reddit moderation user. We strongly recommend using a separate bot account for this.

REDDIT_PASSWORD.description: The password for your Reddit moderation user

REDDIT_SUBREDDIT.description: The subreddit you want to moderate
